title: The skin I didn't know I needed

replies.body:
So if she ults me, is it considered feeding?
https://media.giphy.com/media/K4x1ZL36xWCf6/giphy.gif

Depends on if you can eat all of it or not.

If you can't stomach it and explode, you're the one feeding.
Tahm new op Syndra counter
{{champion:31}}

Report Syndra for feeding Vel'Koz

{{champion:17}} "Vel'koz, you can't eat all those patties at one time! Vel'koz!"

{{champion:161}} "What's gonna happen? Am I gonna blow up?"

{{champion:17}} "No! Worse! It'll go right to your thighs!"

{{champion:161}} "My thighs?"

{{champion:17}} "And then you'll blow up!"

{{champion:161}} "I have thighs? How facinat-"

https://media.tenor.com/images/a6572b4115f67f2aeea90c529d598741/tenor.gif

Hours later. . .

{{champion:161}} ". . ."

{{champion:98}} "Yeah, I remember my first Bjerger Patty."

when syndra builds ad her ult is like

What's next. McShaco?
Shurima fried Azir?
TACO JHIN!?

I can see the Azir one now. It would need some specific VO lines, but hell, take my money.

Idea VO lines:
THE ORDER IS GIVEN, IT WILL BE 9.99 TO THE FIRST WINDOW! DRIVE AROUND!
ORIGINAL RECIPE COURSES THROUGH ME!
Behold the Extra Crispy!
holy shit, all of these are funny as hell!

There's also plenty of less global brands we could advertise.
Anivia & Winter. Though I'm not sure if any of those are left. XD
5 Ghouls and Yorik.
~~Burger Jarvin~~
http://mobaskins.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/leaguecraft-addoaeir.png

Don't forget Pizza Delivery {{champion:15}}.

Screw the brand she's delivering for, it's the concept that matters most here.
Burgot
UMMMMM please?? I thought (mistakenly) that we had enough jinx skins but this one is TOO perfect

If we have too many Jinx skins, replace Zombie Slayer Jinx with this one.

Nobody uses Slayer Jinx anyway.
######kappa

there's never enough Jinx skins

we must get her past the likes of TF, Annie, and Ryze!
And Ahri?
damn you blocked the panty shot
Don't worry, I have plenty of panty shots of Jinx to share
Can confirm.

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/bms.gif
I never realized Batman had such a large hole under his right eye. (>_>)
Yo you right fam
oh i get it cause burgers + america hehe xD joke
it's actually a pun to burgerking and bjergsen ._.

no shit rly? and i made a joke to https://i.ytimg.com/vi/k0OMuhPMj5U/maxresdefault.jpg
but ofc as soon as you make a joke about america, their pride is hurt...

But that's just it though, Bjergsen ins't american. He plays for an america team but isn't one.

It's not that he joke was in poor taste, (NO PUN INTENDED) it was just a bad joke that just comes off as an insult to Bjergsen and America. You can accept that it was a bad joke or effortlessly refute it since everyone seems to already be against you.

I could atleast get it if he was fat but the dude's a living twig. Atleast try to roll with that in your joke or something.

Unfortunately she would be unplayable since she cant buy any items with her sub minimum wage salary

Alright, I've seen the Azir one's a million times, but he Sivir ones got me pretty good.

Well done.

Pizza Delivery Sivir has been one of those skins that everyone wanted to see for the longest time. I remember back when the Skins Team even said that if it gained more popularity, they'd do what they could to make that skin a reality.
Who do i need to throw my wallet at?
